messages.content: Hi! How can I assist you?
Well, it's me that needs your help, can you code Structured Data snippets for me?
Of course! What topic or information would you like me to create snippets for?
I need you to code the best and most reasonable code snippets for this article: https://your-highnesss-radical-site.webflow.io/blog/loyalty-rewards-referrals-by-rivo

I can definitely help you with that! To start, I would need some more context about what you're looking for in the snippets. Do you have any specific information or requirements you want me to include in the snippets? Also, what format do you prefer the snippets to be in?
it's HTML snippets please, I'd need them to be of the type "Article"

I can definitely help you with that! To start, I would need some more context about what you're looking for in the snippets. Do you have any specific information or requirements you want me to include in the snippets? Also, what format do you prefer the snippets to be in?
